Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Chronic myelogenous leukemia (CML). It is used as palliative treatment. This use is approved for the Myleran brand of busulfan. It is also used with other drugs to prepare patients with CML for a stem cell transplant. This use is approved for the Busulfex brand of busulfan.

Section.Para: Busulfan is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
